PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08782021-08-11,  ISED,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectSocial Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada - Public Services Alliance of Canada ** Collective Agreements **
PrecisOrder authorizing the Social Science and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC) to ENTER into TWO COLLECTIVE AGREEMENTS with the Public Service Alliance of Canada for all employees in the Administrative and Foreign Services and the Administrative Support bargaining units for four year agreements expiring on March 31, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
